events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but it doesn't fit me well. I would like to return it and get a refund.
The customer's request was identified as a refund inquiry based on the returned product and refund keywords in the message.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah J., who specializes in refunds and returns for apparel orders.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I’d be happy to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in its original packaging for the return?
Sure, my order number is 89765432. The jacket is brand new, and I have not removed any tags or packaging.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email shortly, and upon receipt, we will process your refund.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I look forward to receiving the shipping label.
The prepaid return shipping label was sent to the customer’s email, and instructions for the return were provided to ensure a smooth refund process.
We are following up to confirm that you have received the return label and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The customer was satisfied with the resolution and confirmed the return shipment, so the case has been closed successfully.
A customer satisfaction survey invitation was sent to gather feedback on the refund and return experience.
